verse.name: v1b
verse.lines: Teach me Your way oh Lord newline And I will walk in Your truth newline Give me an undivided heart newline That I may fear Your name

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: And I will praise You Oh Lord my God newline With all my heart newline I will glorify Your name forever newline Great is Your love towards me newline You have delivered me newline From the depths of the Grave
